TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 249
TEI.2.document_title: James Kennerly to Stephen F Austin, 08-24-1829

document_location.sent_from: Jefferson Barracks near St Louis Missouri

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Kennerly to Austin, St. Louis, August 24, 1829. Asking information about Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 249

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Kennerly to Austin, St. Louis, August 24, 1829. Asking information about Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Jefferson Barracks near St. Louis Mo*/location_mentioned* —*date_mentioned n="08-24-1829">Augt 24, 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Mr Steven Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I am verry desireous of geting some information about the part of the world called *location_mentioned*Austin Settlement*/location_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, The first inquerey is, the climate, the health of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and by what means accessable,*/p*
*p*The Kind of population and number, the general persuits wheather *person_mentioned*Traders */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*agriculturealists*/person_mentioned*, what produce is raised and is best adapted to the climate for exportation. The principal *location_mentioned*Towns */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*water courses*/location_mentioned*, and the language most in use, I have for several years had a desire to visit the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*with a view of settling with my *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, I have some small means principally in *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*, with some merchandize, and would be glad to hear from you candidly on the subject and will feel greatfull for your immedeate reply, should it be favourable. I will visit your *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Fall - 1829">fall*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas Kennerly*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
